text: Little Fauss and Big Halsy is a 1970 American comedy-drama movie directed by Sidney J. Furie and starring Robert Redford, Michael J. Pollard, Lauren Hutton, Noah Beery Jr. and Lucille Benson. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s road movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney J. title: Little Fauss and Big Halsy
